Title: Relates to establishing small business mentoring programs; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Summary: Establishes small business mentoring programs in the dormitory authority of the state of New York, office of general services, department of health, department of transportation, and the empire state development corporation.
LawCode: Add ยง1678-b, Pub Auth L; add ยง204, Exec L; add ยง411, Pub Health L; add ยง23, Transp L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, the executive law, the public health law, and the transportation law, in relation to establishing small business mentoring programs; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
